name: Hero's Land
description:
Intro:
All players spawn on this mysterious land of strong monsters and enemies where the law of the jungle prevails. It’s totally up to you as to how to survive, co-op or solo.

Hero’s Land is an open-world, multi-player survival game. In here, you can unlock distinctive heroes as you progress your exploration, or you can train on-map pets to be your combat partners. Don’t forget that you can make friends, put together a team, and build a home of your own team. Stay alive!

Open World

You’ve gotta beef yourself up, for you are to put up a fight with tremendous monsters and hostile players. Grab your weapons! And good luck!

Vast Arsenal

The diversified weapons, with their own unique skills, will drop when you slay monsters and Bosses. You can carry several weapons with you and switch to a handy one per your situation.

Rewards or Death

You can quit or re-enter the game at anytime. By doing so, you will be rewarded for the performance you’ve put on. Please note that death means the end of your game, too.

Distinctive Heroes

Dozens of distinctive heroes are there for you to unlock, using the coins you earn from each match. It’s definitely pleasant that every single hero has their own unique skill set and look.

Pet and Partner

Yes, there are monsters out there. But you can keep their innocent cubs as pets, and even partners, if that’s your plan to gain strength.

Efficient Grinding

The unique synthesis mechanism has helped smooth out the gear upgrade. You can acquire random gears by slaying various monsters, and identical gears will complete synthesis and update automatically.

Free Installation

You can install Turrets, Stones, Groundspikes and so on at your will. Or maybe, you wanna team up with your friends to create a mind-blowing fort.
